page.title: Location Move
page.description: Here you can move inventories between locations

form.search-info: Shows only items with positive quantites

server.nonpositive-quantity-error: Quantity must be greater than 0 for item no. {{sku}}
server.invalid-placement-error: Item no. {{sku}} has an invalid placement
server.not-default-placement-error: Item no. {{sku}} can only be moved from its default placement "{{placement}}"
server.invalid-batch-error: Item no. {{sku}} at {{placement}} has an invalid batch number
